title: OMG THIS IS AN AWESOME MOVIE!!!!!!
review: WOW, i just finished watching this movie and i have to say it is such an incredible movie! If you like movies like a walk to remember and about a boy you will LOVE this movie! Stop reading and go watch it now! I cant say enough about it!

title: Your rating made me think this was worth watching! IT SUCKS!
review: I cant believe i even watched it! It was hard to follow and just plain sucky...what movie did u guys see? It could not have been this one! I RATE IT A 2 AND THATS A GENEROUS 2. DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME PEOPLE.This is such a draggy movie, very slow, just what were they thinking?
